title: Theoretical Distribution: Uniform Distribution and its Standard Deviation
text: The formula for computing the variance of the distribution is $${\sigma}^2$$ $$=$$ (b - a)**2 / 12, where b-a is the range of the data set

title: Theoretical Distribution: Uniform Distribution and its Standard Deviation
text: What is the variance for the distribution? Write your answer as a fraction

title: Theoretical Distribution: Uniform Distribution and its Standard Deviation
text: The formula for computing the standard deviation of the distribution is $$σ=$$ $$\sqrt{{\sigma}^2}$$
